metadata.name: KnowledgeBase.ConfigurationIssues2025
metadata.description: Configuration system fixes and environment management learnings from authentication integration failures.
metadata.business-impact: Platform/Internal - Prevents staging configuration failures that indicate production readiness issues

issue-category.name: Database Configuration
issue-category.critical-takeaway: #removed-legacyenvironment variable must use Cloud SQL format in staging, not localhost fallback.
Staging environment detection via K_SERVICE and NETRA_ENVIRONMENT variables must prevent localhost database connections.
IsolatedEnvironment caching requires singleton instance reset when testing different environment configurations.

fix-applied.description: Environment configuration loading properly handles staging detection
fix-applied.details: DatabaseURLBuilder validates environment-specific database URLs and prevents localhost in staging/production

issue-category.testing-requirement: Always test #removed-legacyconfiguration with actual staging environment variables set (K_SERVICE, NETRA_ENVIRONMENT)

issue-category.name: Import Path Management
issue-category.critical-takeaway: Import paths must be updated from deprecated starlette.websockets to fastapi.websockets for WebSocket functionality.
RedisClient is actually RedisManager in netra_backend.app.redis_manager - tests must use correct class and async methods.

fix.description: Updated WebSocket imports from starlette to fastapi
fix.pattern: from starlette.websockets import WebSocketState → from fastapi.websockets import WebSocketState

fix.description: Fixed Redis client import and method usage

issue-category.testing-requirement: Integration tests must use correct import paths and async method patterns for all service clients

issue-category.name: Redis Fallback Configuration
issue-category.critical-takeaway: Redis fallback to localhost must be disabled in staging/production environments to prevent false success indications.
Environment variables REDIS_FALLBACK_ENABLED=false and REDIS_REQUIRED=true should control Redis behavior in staging.
Redis connection failures in staging should fail fast, not fall back to localhost, to surface configuration issues early.

code-change.before: Always attempts localhost fallback when Redis connection fails
code-change.after: Checks environment and REDIS_FALLBACK_ENABLED/REDIS_REQUIRED variables to prevent fallback in staging/production

fix-applied.error-handling: Logs specific fallback control settings for debugging: "fallback_enabled={redis_fallback_enabled}, required={redis_required}"

issue-category.testing-requirement: Redis configuration tests must verify fallback is disabled in staging environment simulations

issue-category.name: ClickHouse Connection Testing
issue-category.critical-takeaway: ClickHouseClient uses async connect() method, not sync test_connection() method for connectivity testing.
ClickHouse configuration requires CLICKHOUSE_HOST, CLICKHOUSE_PORT environment variables in staging - no localhost fallback.

fix-applied.description: Updated test to use correct ClickHouse connectivity method

issue-category.testing-requirement: ClickHouse connectivity tests must use async patterns and check actual configured endpoints

architectural-learning.title: Configuration System Architecture Insights
architectural-learning.insight: IsolatedEnvironment singleton pattern requires explicit instance reset when testing different environment configurations
Environment detection logic (K_SERVICE, NETRA_ENVIRONMENT) must be consistently applied across all configuration loading paths
Service client classes (ClickHouse, Redis, Database) should follow consistent async patterns for connection testing
Configuration validation must prevent development fallbacks (localhost, default passwords) in staging/production environments

quality-assurance.test-requirement: Integration tests must simulate staging environment variables to catch configuration cascade failures
Import path tests should validate all service client imports resolve correctly
Configuration tests should verify fallback behavior is environment-appropriate

regression-prevention.check: Verify #removed-legacyformat matches expected staging patterns (Cloud SQL, no localhost)
Verify Redis fallback disabled when REDIS_FALLBACK_ENABLED=false or in staging environment
Verify WebSocket imports use fastapi.websockets, not starlette.websockets
Verify ClickHouse and Redis client imports resolve to correct modules and use async methods

business-value-justification.value-impact: Prevents configuration-related failures in staging that indicate production readiness issues
business-value-justification.strategic-impact: Ensures configuration testing catches environment-specific issues before production deployment
business-value-justification.technical-debt-reduction: Eliminates import path confusion and service client API mismatches that cause test failures
